entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
